story_final_text:
A marina kidnapping happened.

### Canonical Enrichment Addendum
Killer anchor: Spiros Demos (spiros).
Character roster anchors: Spiros Demos, Dr. Elena Markos, Tasos Veris, Katerina Voss, Yannis Petros, Mara Zoi.
Method anchor: abduction followed by suffocation in captivity.
Motive anchor: ransom extraction and debt pressure.
Timeline anchors:
- 7:18 PM Nikos settles the bill at Alkyon Seaside Cafe
- 7:20 PM Nikos leaves the cafe and heads toward Gate 2
- 7:34 PM a dark van enters the marina lot from a blind feeder lane
- 7:40 PM the abduction happens in the parking lot near lane C
Investigative clue path ids: camera_evidence, plate_check, car_item, warehouse_link.
Missing anchors addressed: killer_identity, method, motive, timeline_coverage, clue_path, character_coverage.

leads.en: check the visible plate frame in the camera freeze
leads.el: check the visible plate frame in the camera freeze

leads.en: search the linked vehicle interior for restraint evidence
leads.el: search the linked vehicle interior for restraint evidence

evidence.en: sedative vial trace in glove box
evidence.el: sedative vial trace in glove box

leads.en: link the zip tie brand to warehouse inventory and loading bay cameras
leads.el: link the zip tie brand to warehouse inventory and loading bay cameras

leads.en: check call logs between spiros and tasos around 7:35 to 7:45 pm
leads.el: check call logs between spiros and tasos around 7:35 to 7:45 pm

evidence.en: route sketch from marina to holding site
evidence.el: route sketch from marina to holding site

leads.en: pressure each accomplice with statement requests and contradictions
leads.el: pressure each accomplice with statement requests and contradictions

summary.en: 7:40 PM gate camera shows a dark van tailing Nikos's sedan out of lane C.
summary.el: 7:40 PM gate camera shows a dark van tailing Nikos's sedan out of lane C.

detail.en: Vehicle enters from a blind angle and tracks Nikos at low speed, then cuts lights before the corner.
detail.el: Vehicle enters from a blind angle and tracks Nikos at low speed, then cuts lights before the corner.

micro_details.en: Frame counter jump at 19:40:12 indicates manual camera focus correction.
micro_details.el: Frame counter jump at 19:40:12 indicates manual camera focus correction.

micro_details.en: Rear bumper reflection confirms marine-fuel dock lights were on.
micro_details.el: Rear bumper reflection confirms marine-fuel dock lights were on.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that no second vehicle was present at 19:40 conflicts with frame 19:40:13.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that no second vehicle was present at 19:40 conflicts with frame 19:40:13.

contradiction_tests.en: Any alibi placing Tasos continuously inside the villa at 19:40 conflicts with camera silhouette timing.
contradiction_tests.el: Any alibi placing Tasos continuously inside the villa at 19:40 conflicts with camera silhouette timing.

summary.en: The driver shadow is offset to the left pillar, consistent with Tasos's seat habit.
summary.el: The driver shadow is offset to the left pillar, consistent with Tasos's seat habit.

detail.en: Frame contrast marks the same shoulder tilt Tasos has in prior marina footage.
detail.el: Frame contrast marks the same shoulder tilt Tasos has in prior marina footage.

micro_details.en: Shoulder drop of roughly 6 degrees matches Tasos's habitual steering posture.
micro_details.el: Shoulder drop of roughly 6 degrees matches Tasos's habitual steering posture.

micro_details.en: Headrest notch lines up with Tasos's documented seat setting from fleet service photos.
micro_details.el: Headrest notch lines up with Tasos's documented seat setting from fleet service photos.

contradiction_tests.en: A claim that an unknown taller driver operated the van conflicts with seat-height geometry.
contradiction_tests.el: A claim that an unknown taller driver operated the van conflicts with seat-height geometry.

summary.en: Fuel-dock floodlight angle places the shadow origin at the van driver side at 19:40.
summary.el: Fuel-dock floodlight angle places the shadow origin at the van driver side at 19:40.

detail.en: The 32-degree light angle excludes shadows cast from sidewalk pedestrians.
detail.el: The 32-degree light angle excludes shadows cast from sidewalk pedestrians.

micro_details.en: Dock mast light #3 casts a hard edge matching the driver window frame.
micro_details.el: Dock mast light #3 casts a hard edge matching the driver window frame.

micro_details.en: The shadow edge shortens exactly as the van moves past bay marker C-7.
micro_details.el: The shadow edge shortens exactly as the van moves past bay marker C-7.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that the shadow came from a passerby conflicts with dock-light vector geometry.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that the shadow came from a passerby conflicts with dock-light vector geometry.

summary.en: Gate 2 camera has a 2.8-second occlusion window when buses pass lane B.
summary.el: Gate 2 camera has a 2.8-second occlusion window when buses pass lane B.

detail.en: The van uses this exact occlusion to hide plate transition before exit.
detail.el: The van uses this exact occlusion to hide plate transition before exit.

micro_details.en: Occlusion begins at 19:40:16 and clears at 19:40:19.
micro_details.el: Occlusion begins at 19:40:16 and clears at 19:40:19.

micro_details.en: Wheel blur at reappearance indicates acceleration, not idle waiting.
micro_details.el: Wheel blur at reappearance indicates acceleration, not idle waiting.

contradiction_tests.en: A narrative of continuous full visibility is false because of the known occlusion window.
contradiction_tests.el: A narrative of continuous full visibility is false because of the known occlusion window.

summary.en: Lane C geometry allows a blind merge from service ramp to exit in under 5 seconds.
summary.el: Lane C geometry allows a blind merge from service ramp to exit in under 5 seconds.

detail.en: The abductor route uses the blind merge to avoid kiosk line-of-sight.
detail.el: The abductor route uses the blind merge to avoid kiosk line-of-sight.

micro_details.en: Concrete divider blocks kiosk visibility for 14 meters of approach.
micro_details.el: Concrete divider blocks kiosk visibility for 14 meters of approach.

micro_details.en: Exit lane curvature hides rear plate view beyond marker C-9.
micro_details.el: Exit lane curvature hides rear plate view beyond marker C-9.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that kiosk witnesses had full uninterrupted sight of lane C is geometrically impossible.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that kiosk witnesses had full uninterrupted sight of lane C is geometrically impossible.

summary.en: The visible plate belongs to a shell fleet vehicle and was reassigned that afternoon.
summary.el: The visible plate belongs to a shell fleet vehicle and was reassigned that afternoon.

detail.en: Registry edit is time stamped less than 90 minutes before the abduction window.
detail.el: Registry edit is time stamped less than 90 minutes before the abduction window.

micro_details.en: Registry terminal ID maps to marina office workstation A2-03.
micro_details.el: Registry terminal ID maps to marina office workstation A2-03.

micro_details.en: Edit log notes 'temporary maintenance swap' with no maintenance ticket.
micro_details.el: Edit log notes 'temporary maintenance swap' with no maintenance ticket.

contradiction_tests.en: A claim that the plate mapping was old or routine conflicts with same-day registry audit logs.
contradiction_tests.el: A claim that the plate mapping was old or routine conflicts with same-day registry audit logs.

summary.en: Fleet assignment memo maps the temporary plate to Tasos's vehicle slot.
summary.el: Fleet assignment memo maps the temporary plate to Tasos's vehicle slot.

detail.en: Manual signature is Spiros's office mark, not a marina admin signoff.
detail.el: Manual signature is Spiros's office mark, not a marina admin signoff.

micro_details.en: Memo ink stamp corresponds to the Asteri villa study seal.
micro_details.el: Memo ink stamp corresponds to the Asteri villa study seal.

micro_details.en: Slot code T-2 appears only on Tasos weekly dispatch sheets.
micro_details.el: Slot code T-2 appears only on Tasos weekly dispatch sheets.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that Spiros had no involvement in vehicle reassignment conflicts with signature evidence.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that Spiros had no involvement in vehicle reassignment conflicts with signature evidence.

summary.en: Plate registry was edited between 18:22 and 18:27, then locked from edits.
summary.el: Plate registry was edited between 18:22 and 18:27, then locked from edits.

detail.en: The lockout pattern indicates deliberate pre-incident preparation.
detail.el: The lockout pattern indicates deliberate pre-incident preparation.

micro_details.en: No further edits occurred until after midnight.
micro_details.el: No further edits occurred until after midnight.

micro_details.en: The editor used a privileged credential not assigned to marina clerks.
micro_details.el: The editor used a privileged credential not assigned to marina clerks.

contradiction_tests.en: Claims of a spontaneous plate change during the incident are inconsistent with lockout timing.
contradiction_tests.el: Claims of a spontaneous plate change during the incident are inconsistent with lockout timing.

summary.en: Zip tie lot code from the trunk matches Voss warehouse restraint stock.
summary.el: Zip tie lot code from the trunk matches Voss warehouse restraint stock.

detail.en: Batch code and cut profile align with pallet M-14 issued the previous week.
detail.el: Batch code and cut profile align with pallet M-14 issued the previous week.

micro_details.en: The ties show flush-cut marks from a ratchet cutter used in loading bay prep.
micro_details.el: The ties show flush-cut marks from a ratchet cutter used in loading bay prep.

micro_details.en: Two unused ties in the trunk share sequential batch numbering.
micro_details.el: Two unused ties in the trunk share sequential batch numbering.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim the ties were generic retail stock conflicts with warehouse batch sequencing.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim the ties were generic retail stock conflicts with warehouse batch sequencing.

summary.en: A sedative residue vial in the glove box links to clinic-grade supply.
summary.el: A sedative residue vial in the glove box links to clinic-grade supply.

detail.en: Trace signature matches stock Elena reported missing from locked storage.
detail.el: Trace signature matches stock Elena reported missing from locked storage.

micro_details.en: Residual concentration indicates transfer from recently opened medical vial.
micro_details.el: Residual concentration indicates transfer from recently opened medical vial.

micro_details.en: Cap thread residue matches disposable syringe kits used in controlled sedation.
micro_details.el: Cap thread residue matches disposable syringe kits used in controlled sedation.

contradiction_tests.en: Claims that no chemical restraint was available conflict with clinic stock and glove-box trace.
contradiction_tests.el: Claims that no chemical restraint was available conflict with clinic stock and glove-box trace.

summary.en: Interior arrangement suggests a restrained passenger was hidden below rear sightline.
summary.el: Interior arrangement suggests a restrained passenger was hidden below rear sightline.

detail.en: Seat tilt and blanket fold pattern create concealment from external view.
detail.el: Seat tilt and blanket fold pattern create concealment from external view.

micro_details.en: Rear bench angle was locked one notch lower than standard.
micro_details.el: Rear bench angle was locked one notch lower than standard.

micro_details.en: Fiber transfer from cargo blanket appears on restraint ties.
micro_details.el: Fiber transfer from cargo blanket appears on restraint ties.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that transport happened without concealment conflicts with seat-angle and fiber evidence.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that transport happened without concealment conflicts with seat-angle and fiber evidence.

summary.en: Warehouse ledger logs after-hours rear-door access tied to Spiros's authorization.
summary.el: Warehouse ledger logs after-hours rear-door access tied to Spiros's authorization.

detail.en: Entry is masked under maintenance but aligns with call and vehicle movement timing.
detail.el: Entry is masked under maintenance but aligns with call and vehicle movement timing.

micro_details.en: Access tag was cloned from daytime loader account and reused after closing.
micro_details.el: Access tag was cloned from daytime loader account and reused after closing.

micro_details.en: Door-open duration of 4m12s exceeds normal maintenance checks.
micro_details.el: Door-open duration of 4m12s exceeds normal maintenance checks.

contradiction_tests.en: A claim that the warehouse stayed closed conflicts with authenticated rear-door telemetry.
contradiction_tests.el: A claim that the warehouse stayed closed conflicts with authenticated rear-door telemetry.

summary.en: Loading bay camera captures two figures transferring a restrained person.
summary.el: Loading bay camera captures two figures transferring a restrained person.

detail.en: One figure matches Tasos's gait; second figure wears Spiros-style overcoat silhouette.
detail.el: One figure matches Tasos's gait; second figure wears Spiros-style overcoat silhouette.

micro_details.en: The second figure pauses exactly at blind pillar P3 before re-entering frame.
micro_details.el: The second figure pauses exactly at blind pillar P3 before re-entering frame.

micro_details.en: Ground shadow length indicates the transfer occurred shortly after 21:00.
micro_details.el: Ground shadow length indicates the transfer occurred shortly after 21:00.

contradiction_tests.en: Any claim that only one person handled transfer conflicts with dual-shadow frame analysis.
contradiction_tests.el: Any claim that only one person handled transfer conflicts with dual-shadow frame analysis.

summary.en: A fixed blind spot at loading bay pillar P3 allows face concealment for 1.6 seconds.
summary.el: A fixed blind spot at loading bay pillar P3 allows face concealment for 1.6 seconds.

detail.en: The route through P3 was used to avoid direct facial capture.
detail.el: The route through P3 was used to avoid direct facial capture.

micro_details.en: Camera sweep delay at P3 is consistent across archived nights.
micro_details.el: Camera sweep delay at P3 is consistent across archived nights.

micro_details.en: Footstep spacing indicates preplanned movement through the blind corridor.
micro_details.el: Footstep spacing indicates preplanned movement through the blind corridor.

contradiction_tests.en: A claim that camera coverage guaranteed identification at all times is technically false.
contradiction_tests.el: A claim that camera coverage guaranteed identification at all times is technically false.

summary.en: Call logs show Spiros issuing timing instructions to Tasos before and after the abduction.
summary.el: Call logs show Spiros issuing timing instructions to Tasos before and after the abduction.

detail.en: Two short calls bracket the capture window and one call confirms drop-site relocation.
detail.el: Two short calls bracket the capture window and one call confirms drop-site relocation.

micro_details.en: Call bursts occur at 19:37, 19:44, and 20:11 with low-duration command cadence.
micro_details.el: Call bursts occur at 19:37, 19:44, and 20:11 with low-duration command cadence.

micro_details.en: Language pattern shows imperative verbs and route shorthand, not casual speech.
micro_details.el: Language pattern shows imperative verbs and route shorthand, not casual speech.

contradiction_tests.en: A claim that Spiros had no command role conflicts with timing and cadence of outbound calls.
contradiction_tests.el: A claim that Spiros had no command role conflicts with timing and cadence of outbound calls.

summary.en: Route sketch and toll timing place Spiros near the holding site corridor.
summary.el: Route sketch and toll timing place Spiros near the holding site corridor.

detail.en: Travel timing is incompatible with his claimed villa-only timeline.
detail.el: Travel timing is incompatible with his claimed villa-only timeline.

micro_details.en: Toll-camera timestamp at 20:52 leaves insufficient time for a continuous villa stay.
micro_details.el: Toll-camera timestamp at 20:52 leaves insufficient time for a continuous villa stay.

micro_details.en: Route turn sequence matches notes found in folded glove-compartment map.
micro_details.el: Route turn sequence matches notes found in folded glove-compartment map.

contradiction_tests.en: Any villa-only alibi for Spiros between 20:45 and 21:05 fails route-timing constraints.
contradiction_tests.el: Any villa-only alibi for Spiros between 20:45 and 21:05 fails route-timing constraints.

summary.en: Minute-by-minute contradiction grid shows impossible overlap across key alibis.
summary.el: Minute-by-minute contradiction grid shows impossible overlap across key alibis.

detail.en: Tasos movement, Spiros calls, and warehouse door telemetry cannot all be innocent together.
detail.el: Tasos movement, Spiros calls, and warehouse door telemetry cannot all be innocent together.

micro_details.en: At 19:44 Tasos receives command call while van is already on the route segment.
micro_details.el: At 19:44 Tasos receives command call while van is already on the route segment.

micro_details.en: At 20:11 Spiros call overlaps with declared villa paperwork window.
micro_details.el: At 20:11 Spiros call overlaps with declared villa paperwork window.

micro_details.en: At 21:03 warehouse transfer timing collides with claimed separate whereabouts.
micro_details.el: At 21:03 warehouse transfer timing collides with claimed separate whereabouts.

contradiction_tests.en: If Tasos was at villa, plate-linked van movement is unexplained.
contradiction_tests.el: If Tasos was at villa, plate-linked van movement is unexplained.

contradiction_tests.en: If Spiros never left villa, toll and call sequencing is unexplained.
contradiction_tests.el: If Spiros never left villa, toll and call sequencing is unexplained.

contradiction_tests.en: If warehouse was empty, rear-door open telemetry and shadow transfer are unexplained.
contradiction_tests.el: If warehouse was empty, rear-door open telemetry and shadow transfer are unexplained.

text.en: Fine. Spiros told me to swap the plate before dusk and keep quiet about lane C.
text.el: Fine. Spiros told me to swap the plate before dusk and keep quiet about lane C.

text.en: Those restraints came from warehouse stock. I did not plan the grab, but Spiros asked for unlogged access.
text.el: Those restraints came from warehouse stock. I did not plan the grab, but Spiros asked for unlogged access.

evidence_label.en: recorded statement: unlogged warehouse access request
evidence_label.el: recorded statement: unlogged warehouse access request

text.en: I heard Spiros direct Tasos on timing and location. I wanted this contained, but not like this.
text.el: I heard Spiros direct Tasos on timing and location. I wanted this contained, but not like this.

text.en: I orchestrated the pickup for ransom leverage. The plan was control, not murder, and it collapsed in the warehouse.
text.el: I orchestrated the pickup for ransom leverage. The plan was control, not murder, and it collapsed in the warehouse.

evidence_label.en: recorded admission: orchestration and control plan
evidence_label.el: recorded admission: orchestration and control plan

relationship_to_victim.el: συνεργάτης της οικογένειας και υπεύθυνος logistics
